A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a gut punch to all Star Wars fans. No part of this space movie belonged in the Star Wars universe. Yoda scene tact on\, Leia as Superman in space\, but the biggest atrocity was the treatment of Luke Skywalker. To think Luke from ROJ would even consider murdering someone in their sleep?!?! Discarding Anakin’s light saber?! Killing him was Rian Johnson’s final attempt to destroy everything the original trilogy built. - - Rogue One ended their movie with the memorable Vader scene which added to the Vader legend\, but more importantly\, made sense in the universe. Rian Johnson’s complete disregard to Luke’s iconic character couldn’t have been more clear than the first scene Luke has\, tossing his fathers light saber so carelessly.
